events.message: I just received my order, but the laptop screen has a large crack and the device doesn’t turn on at all.
The reported issue has been identified as a product defect due to a broken screen and malfunction.
An agent has been assigned to assist with your defective product case and will reach out shortly.
Hello, I’m here to help you with the issue regarding your laptop’s broken screen. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Could you please provide photos of the cracked screen and confirm if the laptop powers on at all?
I attached photos showing the crack clearly, and unfortunately, the laptop does not power up despite multiple attempts.
We will arrange a replacement unit to be shipped to you immediately and provide a return label for the defective laptop.
Thank you for the quick response and the replacement offer. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
The replacement process has been initiated and the return package will be sent shortly for your defective laptop.
Checking in to confirm you have received the replacement laptop and if everything is working as expected now.
Since you confirmed the replacement works well, we are closing this case. Please contact us again if needed.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on how we handled your product defect issue.
